name: ROBOMITTENS: Destroyer of World
description:
The player's hitbox is currently larger than it should be, I will fix this after voting has concluded. ~Matt

Weave through a field of debris as you fall from space, and hit the planet with enough force to rip right through it!

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

  • WASD = Movement
  • SPACE = Dodge (grants you temporary invulnerability from debris & increased maneuverability)
  • 1, 2, 3 = Low, Mid, Max video settings

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • Left Stick = Movement
  • Bottom Button = Dodge

(Game sounds are quiet in space, but get louder as you enter the planet's atmosphere)

A game jam entry by Matt (programming) & Julian (art) of TwoGlassHams

All models/materials created new for this project. Sounds either from Soundly or public domain via Freesound
